DOC.brief_summary: To identify dose combination telmisartan ramipril effective reduce diastolic blood pressure respective monotherapies patient Stage I II hypertension .
DOC.brief_title: Telmisartan ( Micardis ) Ramipril ( Altace ) - Factorial Design Study Treatment Hypertension
DOC.criteria: Male female patient > =18 year age Stage I II hypertension define : mean seat cuff diastolic blood pressure > =95 < =119 mmHg Main Pregnant breastfeed unwilling use birth control study secondary hypertension SBP > =180 mmHg DBP > =120 mmHg severe renal dysfunction hepatic insufficiency stroke within last 6 month myocardial infarction , cardiac surgery , percutaneous transluminal coronary angioplasty , unstable angina coronary artery bypass graft within past three month unstable uncontrolled diabetes history angioedema either study drug , hypersensitivity study drug .
